rooms.room_name: Living & Dining Area with Open Kitchen
rooms.description: A spacious open-plan area integrating the living room, dining space and kitchen. Mediterranean design elements such as terracotta tiles, stucco walls, and decorative arches are used. Vastu principles are considered by orienting the entrance towards the east or north.

A single large bedroom that serves as a studio apartment area, featuring built-in storage and natural light from the south or west-facing windows. The layout is designed to ensure privacy while maximizing daylight.
A dedicated library room adjacent to the living area with ample shelving for books, comfortable seating and window placement that promotes intellectual stimulation and good Vastu energy.

openings.description: The main entrance is positioned on the north side to invite positive energy according to Vastu principles. Decorative elements such as Mediterranean arches are integrated.
A private pool area accessible from the south-east corner of the plot, designed with a semi-enclosed patio that flows into the main living space.
An open terrace or balcony providing outdoor seating and relaxation. This is aligned with Mediterranean design aesthetics and ensures good natural ventilation.
A separate entrance for service purposes, keeping in line with practical considerations and maintaining clear separation between public and private spaces.
